LA Basic, Elimination Matrix From The Other Side

What will happen, when we multiply an elimination matrix from the other side?
You can see the process below,

Multiplying by E21 on the right side will subtract 4 times column 2 from column 1. (4 times row 2 from 1 on the left side)
It is the same with Row Exchange Matrix (Permutation matrix)
